price: 63. Mpe tango bazongeli tata wa bango, balobi: Oh tata wa biso! Baboyi kopesa biso biloko. Pesa biso ndeko wa biso mpo tokoka kozua biloko, mpe ya sólo, biso tokobatela ye.
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيهِمۡ قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا ٱلۡكَيۡلُ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعَنَآ أَخَانَا نَكۡتَلۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: falammā rajaʿū ilā abīhim qālū yāabānā muniʿa minnā al-kaylu fa-arsil maʿanā akhānā naktal wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
